docs.snippet: White House officials have been looking into whether $500 million in loans that went to Trump administration senior adviser Jared Kushner's family real estate company may have spurred ethics or criminal law violations, according to the head of the...

headline.print_headline: White House Probing Huge Loans to Kushner's Family Firm
headline.main: White House Probing Huge Loans to Kushner's Family Firm

docs.snippet: New York, California and other states vowed on Tuesday to stop the U.S. government from asking in the 2020 census whether  people are citizens, arguing the question could stop immigrants from participating and skew the makeup of Congress.

headline.print_headline: States Vow to Fight U.S. Plan to Ask Citizenship Question on Census
headline.main: States Vow to Fight U.S. Plan to Ask Citizenship Question on Census

docs.snippet: China called on World Trade Organization members on Monday to unite to prevent the United States "wrecking" the WTO, and it urged them to oppose U.S. President Donald Trump's tariffs targeting China's alleged theft of intellectual property.

headline.print_headline: China Urges WTO Members-Put U.S. Tariff 'Beast Back in the Cage'
headline.main: China Urges WTO Members-Put U.S. Tariff 'Beast Back in the Cage'

docs.snippet: Still truckin’ almost a half-century on but a little lost in translation.

China was mentioned only in broad terms when President Trump announced plans to impose tariffs on steel and aluminum imports. But the world’s largest maker of steel was a major driver behind the action.

headline.main: The U.S. Wants to Take On China With Trade. The Rest of the World Will Be Caught in the Middle.

docs.snippet: Ms. Mirren talks about “The Leisure Seeker,” an Italian take on the American road trip, and about what she would tell her younger self.

docs.snippet: A former FBI agent who allegedly shared secret documents with a national media organization has been charged months after Attorney General Jeff Sessions vowed to crack down on government leaks.

headline.print_headline: Ex-Minneapolis FBI Agent Accused of Leaking Files to Media
headline.main: Ex-Minneapolis FBI Agent Accused of Leaking Files to Media
